package.description:
This package contains a ROS node that communicates with the compass on the Proteus 3 robot. It depends on the serial package:
http://wjwwood.github.com/serial/
Download and compile a copy of this package by executing the following commands within your ROS workspace:
$ git clone git://github.com/wjwwood/serial.git $ rospack profile $ roscd serial $ rosmake
package.author: Chien-Liang Fok
